TopicTitle: cheat to get to the new planets

Articles.Content: go dowload any mod that has fuel tank go to one of the fuel tanks cunfig and change fuel from like 250 to 25000000000000000 get to any moon or planet with 1 fuel tank
kos, nearly all KSP players prefer the challenge of getting to the Mun without cheating, some might use add-ons to make it easter, or harder, a fuel hack like this tends to be frowned upon though.

Yeah, it does not really give you a sense of accomplishment. (Though you can access the debug menu by pressing shift+ctrl+alt+D and that has an infinite fuel option.) But only do this if you just want to test out EVAs and low-grav/high-grav situations.
